title: Intruder Wanted to Break Speaker Pelosi’s Kneecaps, Federal Complaint Says
description: Federal prosecutors filed charges on Monday against the man the police said broke into House Speaker Nancy Pelosi’s San Francisco home and struck her husband with a hammer.
dc:creator: Kellen Browning, Glenn Thrush and Tim Arango
media:description: Police closed a street near the Pelosi residence in San Francisco as they investigated the scene on Friday.
